metadata.name: Frost light
metadata.description:
The dazzling white of summer.
The soft sparkle that shine up the winter morning.
The brilliance of flowers reflected in the water.
The colors of the sky rustling in the gentle breeze.
The fire lit in the drop of water.
The dawn that makes me forget to blink.
The seasons go around.
Always feeling the faint light.
  
Dimensions: 5760 * 3840
Resolution: 350dpi
Location: Mt.Asama / Japan
Date: 12/22/2014
Edition: 1/1
  
  
目の眩む夏の白
冬の朝を照らすやわらかなきらめき
水面が映す花あかり
風にそよぐ空の色
しずくの中の灯火
瞬くことを忘れる夜明け
うつろう季節
かすかな光をいつも感じている
